product_name: Carve Designs Janie Reversible Bikini Bottoms - Women's
long_description: Whether you feel like sporting the basics or spicing things up with a bold pattern, the Carve Janie Reversible bikini bottoms do double duty when heading out for fun in the surf or sand.
